meta.name: Pay per ride
meta.synopsis: Try out whim before you buy subscription
meta.description: Explore Whim and pay for journeys individually

meta.name: Light
meta.description: The Light travel package includes unlimited public transport and 1000 Whim points. You choose how to use your whims, top-up is also possible, whenever you need!

meta.name: Medium
meta.synopsis: A package that fully caters for the needs of an urban consumer
meta.description: The Medium travel package includes unlimited public transport and 5500 points to use for taxi rides, rental cars and Whim Car booking.

meta.name: Premium
meta.synopsis: Frequent transport user, such as a business traveller
meta.description: The Premium travel package includes 9000 Whim points to use for an extensive amount of taxi trips, rental car days, Whim Car booking. On-top of that youâ€™ll get unlimited public transport.
